definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge

sentences.english: Someday I will watch you brushing your child's hair.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我会看见你坐在床沿，梳理孩子柔细的发丝。

sentences.english: Place the bed throw across the bottom half of the bed and smooth out.
sentences.chinese: 把床沿平整地放在床一半靠下处。

sentences.english: You sat on the edge of the bed, watching movies together in front of the computer.
sentences.chinese: 你们坐在床沿上，一起对着电脑看电影。

sentences.english: Fantine's hand was hanging over the side of the bed.
sentences.chinese: 芳汀的手还垂在床沿外。

sentences.english: Usually though, the dog slept at the very edge of the bed on a throw rug.
sentences.chinese: 不过一般情况下，它却总睡在一条紧挨床沿的地毯上。

sentences.english: With help, Justin shifted his legs over the side of the bed.
sentences.chinese: 贾斯廷在妈妈的帮助下将双腿挪过床沿。

sentences.english: He came in and sat on the edge of the bed.
sentences.chinese: 他进了房间坐到了床沿上。

sentences.english: He sat on the edge of his cot , running his fingers through his wild hair.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在床沿上，用手指理了理蓬乱的头发。

sentences.english: Bed throw must be centered and smooth.

definition: to curl up (like a scroll)/to huddle/Melania libertina/wriggle (as a worm)
